Sorry, heedling, for not replying sooner.  You might try visiting 
Snowstorm's Sourceforge page 
(http://sourceforge.net/forum/?group_id=50083 ) for questions about 
Open Gladiator.  I've been busy with going back to college. [I'm going 
to try to get the page on elves put up pretty soon]

This week we are evaluating slime.

I believe slime are the ultimate defensive character in the game, with 
them growing right back almost as soon as knock them down a size 
(never quite able to pull that feat while controlling a slime.).

Admittedly, I do think slime should have a few more abilities: combine 
(heck if two slime can split, why can't they combine to form a more 
powerfull slime), shrink (that way slime don't have to divide to go 
through a passage if it's too narrow), a corrosive acid attack, and 
maybe a "digest" attack (if your character is completed surrounded by 
slime and relatively weak compared to slime, they may be able to 
"digest" your character and kill it).

Admittedly, I would like it relisted attacks for slime:
1)grow with alternate of shrink
2)split with alternate of combine
3)corrosive acid with alternate of digest
